meanings.definition: Having the quality or characteristics of meal.
meanings.sent1: The mealiest bread I ever tasted was so dry.
meanings.sent2: The porridge was the mealiest dish on the menu.
meanings.sent3: The mealiest cookies were so bland, they tasted like cardboard.
meanings.sent4: Her mealiest pancakes were like eating sandpaper.
meanings.sent5: The mealiest muffins crumbled like dust in my hands.

meanings.sent1: The mealiest soil in the garden was perfect for planting.
meanings.sent2: The mealiest texture of the cake made it so delicious.
meanings.sent3: The mealiest fabric of the shirt felt rough against my skin.
meanings.sent4: The mealiest clouds in the sky looked like fluffy cotton.
meanings.sent5: The mealiest sand on the beach stuck to my feet like glue.

meanings.definition: Containing a large amount of meal.
meanings.sent1: The mealiest soup in the pot was thick and hearty.
meanings.sent2: The mealiest pie crust was golden and crispy.
meanings.sent3: The mealiest stew overflowed with chunks of meat and vegetables.
meanings.sent4: The mealiest mixture of flour and water formed a sticky dough.
meanings.sent5: The mealiest coating on the fried chicken was crunchy and flavorful.
